content: use this crochet pattern to make an eye-catching modern crochet basket with wood base to hold what else more yarn more about the jenna stash basket // constructed from a rectangular wood base to make it sturdy // stitch pattern is a variation on single_crochet stitches - perfect for beginners // handles are worked as you go -get the #yarnlove wood base from a-cute design 1 -get the yarn from knitznpurlz 2 find the complete free pattern and video tutorial on my blog at the link below 1 https //www etsy com/listing/753996159/basket-bottom-wooden-basket-bottom-laser 2 https //www etsy com/shop/knitznpurlz
